message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm holding out for something closer to $13,500. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,250?
